name: Ghost World 3D 1
description:
This is the older Ghost World 3D 1 (v0.9), the first playable Version:

Find & collect in this Pac-Man & FPS like Game all Dollars. Avoid Ghosts, and don't lose your Orientation, especially in Maze-Levels. You can change the collected Dollars in Ammo, Extras, Ghostscanner-Updates & Minimap-Updates. But you can collect things like Ammo & Live's too. This is the first playable Version from this Game (Ghost World 3D v0.9, 17 Levels).
When you don't play it in Windows XP, some Dollarbox-/Wall-/Door- Textures are black. But newer Versions in Ghost World 3D 2 (v0.91 and later) don't have this Problems.

Ghost World 3D 2 Some years after the release of Ghost World 3D 1 (GW3D v0.9) i made this game better, made other Levels, and much more. The first better Version was GW3D v0.91, released 07.03.2013 (german date).
Between 07.03.2013 and 10.09.2014 i released 13 better Versions (i called all v0.91). Other Releases: GW3D v0.92=03.04.2015, v0.93=06.10.2015, v0.94=30.07.2016.
2018 or 2019 i will release GW3D 2 (v2.0) - it have other & better Textures and Fonts and Sounds, have 33 Levels, and more.

Deutsche Beschreibung Finde in dieser Mischung aus Pac Man und Ego-Shooter alle Dollars und weiteres. Umgehe Geister, und verliere insbesondere in Labyrinth-Levels nicht die Orientierung. Dollars sind in Munition,Extras, Navigationshilfen und Updates eintauschbar.
